name: Prison Identities - Avis Spooner
description:
Prison Identities - Avis Spooner, a convicted female prisoner with no mug shot. There are records of Avis also known as Alice Spooner, the woman with two faces. She has an incredible story of living two lives and this inspired this collage. The written information is all true from local archives for Shepton Mallet Prison. The image is truly fictional. 


This is part of ongoing research from the Prison Residencies project at Shepton Mallet Prison, UK 18/09/2021 - 03/10/2021.
